name: Find It
description:
Based on the old familiar children's activity of pointing out the odd picture among a screen full of the same ones. But you have only one minute to scour through the many levels and it gets harder and harder as you go along. Let this casual game keep you company in between meetings or during commute. Charming 8-bit chiptune soundtrack and pixel art.

Get more fun games at http://www.tenorgames.com.
